# HAR Schema [![version][npm-version]][npm-video] [![License][npm-license]][license-video]

> JSON Schema for HTTP Archive ([HAR][spec]).

[![Build Status][travis-image]][travis-video]
[![Downloads][npm-downloads]][npm-video]
[![Code Climate][codeclimate-quality]][codeclimate-video]
[![Coverage Status][codeclimate-coverage]][codeclimate-video]
[![Dependency Status][dependencyci-image]][dependencyci-video]
[![Dependencies][david-image]][david-video]

## Install

```bash
npm install --only=production --save har-schema
```

## Usage

Compatible with any [JSON Schema validation tool][validator].
